name: Beat-Box Factory
description:
WASD to move

This is a game where you must follow the rythm to avoid being cut in half, run over, or impaled by a blaster!

In Beat-Box-Factory you must close the haunted gases that give life to the objects of the factory at night. To do this, you must step on them or cover them with a box for a few seconds. But be careful where you go, according to the rhythmic pattern, the objects will move and it could be your end!

Will you survive all nights?

----

This minigame was developed for Knitweave Jam # 1, I was a bit busy so I couldn't spend enough time on it. I hope I can finish its development after the jam.
